duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare technical proposals for customers and work with the Sales department.
Understand the customer’s specific application to apply the correct GEA product.
Determine costing and estimated delivery for projects.
Interact with various groups within GEA and outside Sales organization.
Work with vendors to obtain quotes for components not fabricated at GEA.
Perform calculations to determine major component sizing.
Assist in the handover process to Project Engineering after receipt of order.

education_certification.credential: B.S. in Mechanical Engineering or related field
